column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I just moved to the block where their Evanston restaurant is and was looking forward to trying Malnati's for the first time.  I shared a salad and a pizza with two friends; the amounts were just right
column2: but I was disappointed in both.  The salad was fairly tasteless and the vegetarian pizza
column4: was not really all that good.   I'll try the sausage one next and hope its better.
